attributes.action: Remain should not be on a second referendum ballot paper
attributes.additional_details:
MP's have done the best they can to go against the will of the people 
they have to finish the will of the people and honour the 2016 referendum and put there own issues to one side 
Remain should not be aloud to be on the ballot paper they want that on to split the vote to get what they want 
the referendum in 2016 was an in or out vote we voted out and the only vote now should be on the deal, as MP's can not get it sorted then that is the only option we should now vote on
attributes.background: we had a referendum to leave or remain in the EU in 2016 and the people voted to leave this part should be honoured and the only vote if there is a second referendum is except the deal on the table or leave with no deal
